html:
10.5.20  3:39 pm   has one of the questions on this site ever helped you immensely/helped you become a better person, in your own estimation?

      it's usually more than one

10.5.20  3:35 pm   do you think somebody in the world is screaming at all times?

      [calculating] yes

10.5.20  3:23 pm   what do you do when u're bored

      see if you can rake up some brooms

10.5.20  3:05 pm   how did you become so awesome?

      i think you mean 'regular', but the whole trick to that is making sure your name tag is facing away from you

10.5.20  2:29 pm   will you make more music?

      of course

10.5.20  2:26 pm   Are humans tasteful

      yes. that is their claim to fame

10.5.20  1:54 pm   you've mentioned a few songs you like, and movies you like...

     i doubt that

     what's a video game you like?

      what's the game where you can make videos

10.5.20  1:46 pm   What's your favourite music type?

      normal

10.5.20  12:59 pm   why do we exist

      to see what it's like

10.5.20  12:56 pm   what color should the sky be changed to

      black, at some point

10.5.20  12:37 pm   How is the 3D animation going?

      there's good news and bad news. the bad news is it worsens the condition i have where my brain insists on complicating things at every moment. the good news is, it actually allows me to get more mileage out of simple things than ever before

10.5.20  12:24 pm   do you like music

      it's ok

10.5.20  11:51 am   do you think sunderday should exist

      no

10.5.20  11:46 am   will you be posting on instagram soon?

      oh hell yeah

10.5.20  11:25 am   why does the letter "C" have two identities but the two identities "K and S" aren't used in the words that actually have their sounds? 

      this is to cause chaos in society to distract from the peculiar fact that food is not free

10.5.20  11:08 am   are capital letters the root of all of 2020's problems

      no

10.5.20  10:59 am   do you out source your answers to other people or do you just sit around and answer them all cause that seems like a lot of work

      the most important thing is i am actually standing up

10.5.20  10:52 am   concept: leap days are no longer a day of the week. e.g. monday, february 28; leap day, february 29; tuesday, march 1

      i would say take it a step further and have 2 skip days on leap years and 1 skip day on normal years, so that makes every date always the same day of the week, which would be fun to memorize

10.5.20  10:31 am   Are spoons better than forks?

      yes and no

10.5.20  10:10 am   Dont you think gym class should be spelled jim and all the coaches should be called jim

      maybe for like 1 scene, or half a scene

10.5.20  10:09 am   Do you have any fears? Like I have arachnophobia. 

      my consistant fear is that i won't be able to figure out how to do what i do fast enough for anyone to even be aware that i'm doing it

10.5.20  9:57 am   You've mentioned that you want to get on a schedule of releasing a song/video every 3 weeks or so after this initial one. Is this first one for some reason different?

     the first one always has the most uncontrollable expansive tendency

      How come you haven't held yourself to the same 3 week standard as what you want to get to?

     because it wasn't even close to done, despite having worked on it every day as fast as i can during that whole time

     From my understanding, you've been working on this same song/video for nearly 2 months now.

      (simple plan voice) "welcome to my life"

10.5.20  9:43 am   Since you said that you are approximately 60% done with your next project, and that you have worked on your next project for 5 weeks, does that mean the total time for you to complete your project will be 5/.6=8.33 weeks and will be released in approximately 8.33-5=3.33 weeks?

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

10.5.20  9:27 am   Do you think the quantity of "Which song of yours is your favorite?" questions you receive on a daily basis is because of a constant stream of new visitors to your site, people who know they're going to get the same answer yet ask anyway for the sake of trolling, or long-time users who just don't seem to have gotten the memo?

     i would guess that it's mostly new people

     Does getting so many of the same question ever grate on you?

      not anymore, at this point i have been fully grated, to perfection

10.5.20  9:22 am   What is your favorite BPM for writing songs?

      90

10.5.20  9:15 am   why do you use capital letters?

      it calms me down

10.5.20  7:24 am   how long does it take to make one of your song videos(hour-wise).

     we'll see

      also what apps do you use?

     i don't know

10.5.20  6:55 am   How big do you have to be to go to the mall

      what the heck is a mall

10.5.20  6:47 am   What do you think about the pandemic? 

      it's for girls. just kidding, it doesn't matter what gender you are, you can still participate in the pandemic

10.5.20  6:19 am   does infinite money generate infinite happiness?

      no

10.5.20  4:43 am   Are you still making music 

      oh hell yeah

10.5.20  4:32 am   Most people who come here read your answers to questions submitted by other people. If they do ask a question, they'll probably never see the answer. What do you think of that?

     the good news is it means i do not have to answer every question, and i am also not pressured to answer any question immediately

     Did this occur to you when you made this Q/A section of your website?

     yes

     It's kinda fun.

10.5.20  4:03 am   Are you making a new video?

      yes, but what's more important is that i will make many many more videos after that

10.5.20  3:13 am   is it normal to not feel like a real person

      sort of

10.5.20  2:08 am   what if i wasn't feeling randy but i accidentally clicked the "i'm feeling randy" button?

      you'll want to go ahead and click the 'back to normal' button. another option of course is to power off your device entirely

10.5.20  1:06 am   how do you find your own style

      have you considering entering panic mode

10.5.20  1:02 am   How do you deal with Penguins?

      if you can't beat them join them

10.5.20  12:19 am   Does learning new languages open up a world of opportunities? 

      yes

10.4.20  11:51 pm   what is the worst feeling?

      bad

10.4.20  11:26 pm   i just saw the behind the scenes dance recording videos from "when i get older" and thought it was pretty interesting. do you have a specific process for choreographing this stuff during video planning or do you just have a basic idea of what you want it to look like and make up the details in the moment?

     it's improvised, and then edited selectively

10.4.20  10:56 pm   Is 2020 the craziest year of your lifetime?

      no

10.4.20  10:53 pm   does your new song start with the words "all the way"?

      no

10.4.20  9:55 pm   Would you ever consider writing Marching or orchestra style music?

      i would never consider writing a style. it will happen with or without my consideration

10.4.20  9:08 pm   Do you have any plans/ projects for the future?

      yes

10.4.20  9:05 pm   To where would you like to travel?

      to the opposite side of some of the major oceans, while somehow avoiding going IN to them

10.4.20  9:03 pm   what are some things you find beautiful?

      small rocks,

10.4.20  8:41 pm   Hey Bill. Have any good music recommendations  besides your own stuff of course?

      i recommend you listen to all music. which i understand creates a crisis of time management. which i also recommend, for strengthening purposes

10.4.20  8:37 pm   i'm puzzled by your advice to write the melody and lyrics "together", "at the same time"...

     i'm puzzled by the idea of doing it separately

     I've never had this happen when trying to write so I'm wondering what the process is? Is it sort of like your improv videos, you just stream-of-consciousness stuff out until something sticks? thanks bill

      it comes down to this: you're gonna have to make something up

10.4.20  8:25 pm   I'm going to ask a question sometime in the near future. Is that ok?

      sure

10.4.20  8:04 pm   Thoughts on the world ending tomorrow?

      it will probably start again right after that. at least that's what usually happens
